comments.body: Just want to note that these commands are likely to be spelled differently at some point.

I wonder if this is a good place to have a comment keeping a list of the fx commands that are being used. The list could also be in the form of static const fields of FuchsiaSdk, e.g.:
static const _fxSyslogCommand = <String>["fx", "syslog"];
Pulled all of the fx commands into static consts
